sentence.text: Mutations in Vps33 isoforms cause pigment dilution in apoptotic process (vesicle-mediated transport, buff) and Drosophila (heterophilic cell-cell adhesion via plasma membrane cell adhesion molecules) and the neurogenic arthrogryposis, renal dysfunction and cholestasis syndrome in humans (mRNA splice site selection1, vesicle-mediated transport).

entity.text: heterophilic cell-cell adhesion via plasma membrane cell adhesion molecules
